You can take control of a peacekeeper to rise against the powers of evil that threaten the world today. With full 3D graphics and an immersive story, you'll be hooked for hours. Whether it's 5v5, or even a massive 10v10 battle, these are truly something to experience. And that doesn't even mention the weapon system. In Dark Nemesis, you take control of spirits, a creature which can be used as a mount, to help you traverse the world, or as a powerful weapon that changes, depending on what class you choose.
